refnamediv.refpurpose: convert string or characters to lower-case

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The ne_strlower function modifies every character in the str parameter to lower-case equivalent in-place, and returns str.
The ne_tolower macro returns a lower-case equivalent of char c. The ne_tolower_array returns a character mapping table which is an implementation detail of this macro.
All the above operate on ASCII characters, independent of the locale.

refsect1.title: History
refsect1.para: The ne_strlower function is available in &neon; 0.37.0 and later.
